tweet: We are about to begin our second Summer Town Hall Series event, follow along at  https://flores.house.gov/liveforum/

Tonight at 6:40 PM CST we will be holding our Town Hall event for the Southern Counties (Bastrop, Brazos, Burleson, Lee and Travis). You can watch & participate on our website  https://flores.house.gov/liveforum/or  call in to 1-877-229-8493 and use 111954 for the access code.

Our public servants should be guaranteed equal treatment upon retirement. As such, I am an original cosponsor of the Equal Treatment of Public Servants Act, which repeals the windfall elimination provision (WEP) https://gop-waysandmeans.house.gov/brady-introduces-bipartisan-bill-to-ensure-equal-treatment-of-public-servants-in-social-security-benefits/ …

Our rescheduled second Summer Town Hall Series event for our southern counties (Bastrop, Brazos, Burleson, Lee and Travis) is on Wednesday 7/31 at 6:40 p.m. CST. I look forward to answering your question and getting your feedback. For more details visit  https://flores.house.gov/constituent-services/town-hall-meetings.htm …

Better re-read the Constitution --> everyone (including POTUS) is innocent until proven guilty beyond a reasonable doubt.  Mueller did not charge; so, it is over.

Yesterday, the House voted to oppose the BDS movement. While I was pleased to see this resolution pass, Congress should be doing more than condemning BDS. We need legislative action like the Strengthening America's Security in the Middle East Act. https://thehill.com/homenews/house/454399-house-passes-bill-opposing-bds-exposing-democratic-divides …
